description:
Specially designed for devices that pull a lot of power, the ARB-L16 700UP can deliver up to 2.5A! That kind of power lets your lights last longer in their highest modes. An integrated micro-USB port lets you charge this compact and powerful battery nearly anywhere. With 3 levels of overheating protection, the L16-700 is one of the safest 16340 batteries on the market.

  • Capable of a heavy-load discharge of 3.5C, and has a high rate discharge of 2.5A stable output
  • Built-in female micro-USB port makes charging easy
  • LED charging indicator lets you know when your battery is topped up and ready to go
  • Internal protection circuit in the anode prevents short circuits
  • At least 500 cycles can be expected from a properly maintained battery
  • Steel shell for increased impact resistance
  • Over-charge, discharge, short-circuit and overheating protection
  • 3 sets of overheating protection: pressure-relief valve protection, separate microporous protection and PTC cathodal block protection
  • As 16340 and CR123A batteries differ in voltage, confirm with your product’s manufacturer before using
name: Fenix ARB-L16 700UP Battery
